skills.name: Software Development
skills.para:
I studied software development at Life Choices Academy, where I completed courses in:

- HTML
- CSS
- Bootstrap
- JavaScript
- Vue.js
- MySQL
- Node.js

skills.name: Other Hard-skills
skills.para: In 2020 I enrolled in Stellenbosch university and did Bacheclor of Commerce in Accounting first year. I passed all my first year modules.

skills.name: Public speaking
skills.para: In 2017 I participated in a public speaking competiton addressing the issue of water and sanitation being severely limited sue to socio-economic status.I won the provincials and  represented the Western Cape Province in National Public speaking.

skills.name: Reviewer
skills.para: In 2021 I became part of the Metanoia residence constitutuion review committee. My roles were ensuring the constitution was simple, inclusive and adheres to the houses core values

Education.descr: Currently enrolled for a full stack developer, six months coding course at Life Choices.
Completed second year of studies towards BCom Accounting degree.
Completed first year of studies towards Bachelor of Commerse in Accounting

work.descr: Web dev and Quality Assurance intern
Volunteered at Masigcine Childrens Home, Assisted domestically

testimonials.name: Joel Mukanya
testimonials.paragraph: Siyamanga is very creative, well-behaved, and dedicated; she enjoys working with her peers and works well on her project.She has learned HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and VueJS.She will learn more in the coming months.

testimonials.name: Laiquah Cotie
testimonials.paragraph: Siyamanga is a highly thought intellectual from my perspective.She is brilliant, passionate, ambitious,and extremely hardworking. She always makes sure that she understands the work and if not she communicates  to ask for guidance. She has great communication and leadership skills.

testimonials.name: Uzukhanye Dywili
testimonials.paragraph: Working with Siyamanga was an incredible experience. Her professionalism and attention to detail and made  the entire process seamless.She consistently exceeded my expectations and delivered exceptional results.I  highly recommend her.

testimonials.name: Codi Kadar
testimonials.paragraph: Siyamanga is an exceptional learner with a keen eye for detail,he is an excellent team player who always  go above and beyond to support her fellow students.Her determination, and willingness to collaborate makes her a valuable asset to any team.

testimonials.name: Okuhle Gxotiwe
testimonials.paragraph: Working with Siyamanga was amazing. Her professionalism, attention to detail, and  communication skills made the entire process seamless.

testimonials.name: Thotyelwa Mpongwana
testimonials.paragraph: Siyamanga is dedicated, hard working and a team player. She works well with her peers and performs well on  her projects.She has a good understanding of web development and would be a valuable addition to any team that is lucky enough to have her.
